revised_title: Life-Cycle of Trypanosoma gambiense and Brief Reference to Trypanosoma nanum and Trypanosoma pecorum in Glossina palpalis
tldr: The author investigates the life-cycle of Trypanosoma gambiense and provides a brief reference to the cycles of Trypanosoma nanum and Trypanosoma pecorum in Glossina palpalis. The study focuses on the endogenous cycle in the vertebrate and exogenous cycle in the transmitting host, with a detailed analysis of the various stages and forms of the trypanosomes.
